API¶

Title : Yahoo Description : Defines function to get data from Yahoo! Finance API. Author : Bernardo Paulsen Version : 0.1.0

yahoo.get(ticker: str, initial_date: tuple, final_date: tuple, log_return: bool = True) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

Gets market data for individual assets from Yahoo! Finance API given stock ticker and first and last date.

Parameters

  • ticker (str) – Ticker of stock in Yahoo Finance!

  • initial_date (tuple) – Initial date for the series, (YYYY,M,D)

  • final_date (tuple) – Final date for the series, (YYYY,M,D)

  • log_return (bool, optional) – Whether to calculate lgo return, defaults to True

Returns

Market data for the asset

Return type

pandas.DataFrame
